item.title: My PowerMiner, with LOADDDSS of help with Home :D
item.dc:creator: @wetodded wetodded
item.description:
@wetodded wrote:

[quote=“bigfish58, post:1, topic:11076”]Ok, this is like my first script, and I think i did pretty good I did a basic powerminer at first, then I spoke to home, and he changed it all to SRL 3.1, it works pretty flawlessly atm, tell me what you guys think.

[scar]program PowerMinerByBigfish!;

////////
// // ////// // // ////// // //////
// // // // // // // // // //// //
//////// // // // // // // ////////// //
// // // // // // // // //
// // // //// //// // //
// ////// // // //////// //

                //

//// //// //
//// //// // // ////// ////// // ////// //
//// // // // //// // // // //// // //
// //// // // // // ////////// // //
// //// // // // // // // //
// // // // // // // //
// // // // // //////// // //

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.Include SRL\SRL\Extended\xMapWalk.Scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar}

{/////////////////// SETUP //////////////////////////////////////////////////}
const
Chat1 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want public chat on? change to on if you do
Chat2 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want private chat on? change to on if you do
Chat3 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want trade/compete on? change to on if you do
RockColour = 2174282 ; //Colour of rock
Loads = 100 ; // How many loads to do before logout
DropRocks = True ; // Drop All Rocks Expect Picks? ~Reccomended as True!
UseAntiBan = True ; // Use Antiban?
RunDir = ‘N’ ; // Where to run if fight and so on
Username = ‘bigfish58’ ; //Your RS Username
PassWord = ‘’ ; //Your RS password
NickName = ‘igf’ ; //Your RS Nickname, first 3 letters after the first letter
{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}

FirstPlayer = 0;
procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers( HowManyPlayers );
CurrentPlayer := 0;

Players[0].Name := Username;
Players[0].Pass := PassWord;
Players[0].Nick := NickName;
Players[0].Active:=True;

end;

var
i : integer;
wet, cst, tis, wst, tim, awt, tih, srt, sst,beer,lol1,lol:integer;

Procedure CheckIn;
Begin
if ( not ( GetColor ( 738, 187 ) = 1881790 ))
Then Begin
LoginPlayer;
End;
End;

procedure FindRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if(FindFight)then
begin
RunAwayDirection(RunDir);
Wait(8000+random(2000));
RunBack;
If(wearedead) Then begin
Writeln(‘Ahhh shitt, you died!’)
Writenln(‘Logging out…’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
end;
if(GasFound(x,y))then
begin
RunAwayDirection(RunDir);
Wait(2000+random(1000));
RunBack;
WriteLn(‘Waiting For Gas …’);
Wait(10000+random(2000));
end;
end;

function CheckLeveled: Boolean;
var
x, y: Integer;
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Result := True;
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
Wait(500);
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
Wait(300);
end;
end;
end;

procedure Mine1;
begin
SetRandomOreColor;
FindRandoms;
If( Checkleveled ) Then lol1 := lol1 + 1;
if(FindObj(x,y,‘ine’,RockColour,5))then
begin
if(not(FindGas(x,y)))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true);
if(FlagPresent)then
begin
Flag;
Wait(500+random(500));
end;
end;
end;
end;

procedure Droppa;
begin
if(InvFull)then
begin
Beer := BitmapFromString(5, 5,
‘000001C9C1C9CDC5CDD0CAD0CDC5CD000001D7D1D7D9D2D8DAD5D9’ +
‘DDD9DD564D42000001E6E2E6E7E4E7E8E5E8564D42000001C09018’ +
‘F4F2F4F2F0F2544A3B000001C09018C09018C09018’);
if(FindItemBmpTol(Beer,50))then
begin
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Eat’,1);
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Drink’,1);
end;
if(DropRocks = True)then
begin
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Use’,1);
end else
ClickAllItemsBmpTolWait(‘Drop’,Ore,50,1);
FreeBitmap(Beer);
end;
end;

Procedure CheeseBan;
begin
if (useantiban = True) then begin
PickUpMouseEvery(5+random(10));
LeaveScreenEvery(15+random(5));
HoverEvery(25+random(20),‘random’);
end;
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
Cleardebug;
cst := getsystemTime;
srt := (cst - sst) / 1000;
tih := srt / 3600;
tim := (srt / 60) - tih * 60;
tis := srt - tim * 60 - tih * 3600;
awt := wet - wst
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’ BigFish PowerMiner ‘);
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’ Worked For ’ + inttostr(tih) + ’ Hours ’ + inttostr(tim) + ’ Minutes ’ + inttostr(tis) + ’ Seconds. ‘);
Writeln(’ Mined and droped ’ + IntToStr(lol) + ’ Loads. ‘)
Writeln(’ We have gained ’ + IntToStr(lol1) + ’ levels ‘)
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
SRLRandomsReport;
End;

Procedure FindLost;
begin
If(not(FindObj(x,y,‘ine’,RockColour,5)))
Then begin
Writeln(’ I Think We Are Lost :/’)
Writeln(’ Logging Out to be safe :D’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
End;

Procedure GetColors;
var lol,x, y :integer;
begin
Writeln(’ Finding Colors…’)
FindOreColors(RockColour,5,5)
end;

begin
//Tih := 0;
sst := GetSystemTime;
lol:=0;
lol1:=0;
setupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
NumberOfPlayers(1);
CurrentPlayer:= FirstPlayer;
DeclarePlayers;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
ActivateClient;
FindRs;
CheckIn;
makecompass(‘N’)
SetChat(chat1,1);
SetChat(chat2,2);
SetChat(chat3,3);
FixChat;
Highestangle;
wait(100+random(100))
Getcolors;
SetChat(‘off’,1);
repeat
repeat
Mine1;
Wait(200+random(250));
until(invfull)
FindRandoms;
Droppa;
CheeseBan;
FindLost;
SetChat(‘off’,1);
lol := lol + 1;
Wait(100+random(50));
DisguiseScar(’ Mined ’ + IntToStr(lol) + ’ Loads. ');
Progressreport;
until(lol = Loads)
Logout;
writeln(‘Done all jobs, logging out and terminating script’)
terminatescript;
end.[/scar]

:D[/quote]

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @bleem bleem

@bleem wrote:

i just used this powerminer, the only problem is that it doesnt drop the whole load. It misses between 4-8 ores each time it starts dropping. otherthan that its an excellent script

item.title: My PowerMiner, with LOADDDSS of help with Home :D
item.dc:creator: @wyn10 wyn10
item.description:
@wyn10 wrote:

please put it in a code window
i have done it for yu this time

[code]
program PowerMinerByBigfish;

{ POWER MINER, BY BIGFISH ~~ Bigfish58@gmail.com ~~ }

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.Include SRL\SRL\Extended\xMapWalk.Scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar}

{/////////////////// SETUP //////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{ Rocks Avalible for mining so far:
~coal
~iron
~mith
~copper
~clay
~addy
~tin
MAKE SURE YOU ENTER THE ROCK EXACTLY AS SHOWN ABOVE!

I will be adding the rest of the rocks in later updates

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
///Instructions for setup
~MAKE SURE IN THE CONST, RockType, YOU TYPE THE ROCK NAME IN LOWERCASE!
~Start LOGGED OUT!
~Stand in the middle of a rock field
~Have your pickaxe weilded
~Have your PC at 32 bit colour
~Have RS set to V-Bright
~Fill out the Const’s below
~Drag the crosshair
ENJOY!
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
}
const
Chat1 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want public chat on? change to on if you do
Chat2 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want private chat on? change to on if you do
Chat3 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want trade/compete on? change to on if you do
RockType = ‘coal’ ; //What rock would you like to mine? ~Type ALL in lowercase!!
Loads = 100 ; // How many loads to do before logout
DropRocks = True ; // Drop All Rocks Expect Picks? ~Reccomended as True!
UseAntiBan = True ; // Use Antiban?
RunDir = ‘N’ ; // Where to run if fight and so on
Username = ‘bigfish58’ ; //Your RS Username
PassWord = ‘’ ; //Your RS password
NickName = ‘igf’ ; //Your RS Nickname, first 3 letters after the first letter

{////////////////////// END OF SETUP ////////////////////////////////////////}

{//////////////////////// DONT TOUCH BELOW!!! ///////////////////////////////}
FirstPlayer = 0;
procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers( HowManyPlayers );
CurrentPlayer := 0;

Players[0].Name := Username;
Players[0].Pass := PassWord;
Players[0].Nick := NickName;
Players[0].Active:=True;

end;

var
i : integer;
wet, cst, tis, wst, tim, awt, tih, srt, sst,beer,lol1,lol :integer;

Procedure CheckIn;
Begin
if ( not ( GetColor ( 738, 187 ) = 1881790 ))
Then Begin
LoginPlayer;
End;
End;

procedure FindRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if(FindFight)then
begin
RunAwayDirection(RunDir);
Wait(8000+random(2000));
RunBack;
If(wearedead) Then begin
Status(‘Ahhh shitt, you died!’)
Status(‘Logging out…’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
end;
if(GasFound(x,y))then
begin
RunAwayDirection(RunDir);
Wait(2000+random(1000));
RunBack;
WriteLn(‘Waiting For Gas …’);
Wait(10000+random(2000));
end;
end;

function CheckLeveled: Boolean;
var
x, y: Integer;
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Result := True;
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
Wait(500);
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
Wait(300);
end;
end;
end;

procedure FindOre;
begin
if RockType = ‘coal’ then //Coal
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 1977645, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘mith’ then //Mith
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 8805209, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘addy’ then //Addy
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 5729622, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘iron’ then //Iron
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 2569302, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘copper’ then //Copper
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 4549784, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘tin’ then //Tin
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 6513514, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘clay’ then //Clay
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 4619930, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
end;

procedure MineOre;
begin
repeat
FindOre;
until ChooseOption(x, y, ‘ine’)
FindRandoms;
Wait(1500+random(500));
end;

procedure Droppa;
begin
if(InvFull)then
begin
Beer := BitmapFromString(5, 5,
‘000001C9C1C9CDC5CDD0CAD0CDC5CD000001D7D1D7D9D2D8DAD5D9’ +
‘DDD9DD564D42000001E6E2E6E7E4E7E8E5E8564D42000001C09018’ +
‘F4F2F4F2F0F2544A3B000001C09018C09018C09018’);
if(FindItemBmpTol(Beer,50))then
begin
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Eat’,1);
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Drink’,1);
end;
if(DropRocks = True)then
begin
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Use’,1);
end else
ClickAllItemsBmpTolWait(‘Drop’,Ore,50,1);
FreeBitmap(Beer);
end;
end;

Procedure CheeseBan;
begin
if (useantiban = True) then begin
PickUpMouseEvery(5+random(10));
LeaveScreenEvery(15+random(5));
HoverEvery(25+random(20),‘random’);
end;
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
Cleardebug;
cst := getsystemTime;
srt := (cst - sst) / 1000;
tih := srt / 3600;
tim := (srt / 60) - tih * 60;
tis := srt - tim * 60 - tih * 3600;
awt := wet - wst
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’ BigFish PowerMiner ‘);
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’ Worked For ’ + inttostr(tih) + ’ Hours ’ + inttostr(tim) + ’ Minutes ’ + inttostr(tis) + ’ Seconds. ‘);
Writeln(’ Mined and droped ’ + IntToStr(lol) + ’ Loads. ‘)
Writeln(’ We have gained ’ + IntToStr(lol1) + ’ levels ‘)
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
SRLRandomsReport;
End;

Procedure FindLost;
begin
If(not(FindObj(x,y,‘ine’,6513514,5)))then
begin
Writeln(’ I Think We Are Lost :/’)
Writeln(’ Logging Out to be safe ')
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
End;

Procedure GetColors;
var lol,x, y :integer;
begin
Writeln(’ Finding Colors…’)
FindOreColors(6513514,5,5)
end;

begin
//Tih := 0;
sst := GetSystemTime;
lol:=0;
lol1:=0;
setupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
NumberOfPlayers(1);
CurrentPlayer:= FirstPlayer;
DeclarePlayers;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
ActivateClient;
FindRs;
CheckIn;
makecompass(‘N’)
SetChat(chat1,1);
SetChat(chat2,2);
SetChat(chat3,3);
FixChat;
Highestangle;
wait(100+random(100))
Getcolors;
SetChat(‘off’,1);
repeat
repeat
MineOre;
Wait(200+random(250));
until(invfull)
FindRandoms;
Droppa;
CheeseBan;
FindLost;
SetChat(‘off’,1);
lol := lol + 1;
Wait(100+random(50));
DisguiseScar('Mined ’ + IntToStr(lol) + ’ Loads. ');
Progressreport;
until(lol = Loads)
Logout;
writeln(‘Done all jobs, logging out and terminating script’)
terminatescript;
end. [/code]

item.title: My PowerMiner, with LOADDDSS of help with Home :D
item.dc:creator: @bigfish58 bigfish58
item.description:
@bigfish58 wrote:

Hmmm, i made some changed since last time, so atm im trying to update it to auto colours, but i cant seem to do it

if any one could help, it would be most appreciated

program PowerMinerByBigfish;

{ POWER MINER, BY BIGFISH ~~ Bigfish58@gmail.com ~~ }

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.Include SRL\SRL\Extended\xMapWalk.Scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar}

{/////////////////// SETUP //////////////////////////////////////////////////}
{ Rocks Avalible for mining so far:
~coal
~iron
~mith
~copper
~clay
~addy
~tin
MAKE SURE YOU ENTER THE ROCK EXACTLY AS SHOWN ABOVE!

I will be adding the rest of the rocks in later updates

++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
///Instructions for setup
~MAKE SURE IN THE CONST, RockType, YOU TYPE THE ROCK NAME IN LOWERCASE!
~Start LOGGED OUT!
~Stand in the middle of a rock field
~Have your pickaxe weilded
~Have your PC at 32 bit colour
~Have RS set to V-Bright
~Fill out the Const’s below
~Drag the crosshair
ENJOY!
++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++
}
const
Chat1 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want public chat on? change to on if you do
Chat2 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want private chat on? change to on if you do
Chat3 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want trade/compete on? change to on if you do
RockType = ‘coal’ ; //What rock would you like to mine? ~Type ALL in lowercase!!
Loads = 100 ; // How many loads to do before logout
DropRocks = True ; // Drop All Rocks Expect Picks? ~Reccomended as True!
UseAntiBan = True ; // Use Antiban?
RunDir = ‘N’ ; // Where to run if fight and so on
Username = ‘bigfish58’ ; //Your RS Username
PassWord = ‘’ ; //Your RS password
NickName = ‘igf’ ; //Your RS Nickname, first 3 letters after the first letter

{////////////////////// END OF SETUP ////////////////////////////////////////}

{//////////////////////// DONT TOUCH BELOW!!! ///////////////////////////////}
FirstPlayer = 0;
procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers( HowManyPlayers );
CurrentPlayer := 0;

Players[0].Name := Username;
Players[0].Pass := PassWord;
Players[0].Nick := NickName;
Players[0].Active:=True;

end;

var
i : integer;
wet, cst, tis, wst, tim, awt, tih, srt, sst,beer,lol1,lol :integer;

Procedure CheckIn;
Begin
if ( not ( GetColor ( 738, 187 ) = 1881790 ))
Then Begin
LoginPlayer;
End;
End;

procedure FindRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if(FindFight)then
begin
RunAwayDirection(RunDir);
Wait(8000+random(2000));
RunBack;
If(wearedead) Then begin
Status(‘Ahhh shitt, you died!’)
Status(‘Logging out…’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
end;
if(GasFound(x,y))then
begin
RunAwayDirection(RunDir);
Wait(2000+random(1000));
RunBack;
WriteLn(‘Waiting For Gas …’);
Wait(10000+random(2000));
end;
end;

function CheckLeveled: Boolean;
var
x, y: Integer;
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Result := True;
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
Wait(500);
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
Wait(300);
end;
end;
end;

procedure FindOre;
begin
if RockType = ‘coal’ then //Coal
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 1977645, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘mith’ then //Mith
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 8805209, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘addy’ then //Addy
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 5729622, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘iron’ then //Iron
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 2569302, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘copper’ then //Copper
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 4549784, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘tin’ then //Tin
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 6513514, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
if RockType = ‘clay’ then //Clay
if findcolortolerance(x, y, 4619930, 6, 1, 513, 335, 11) then begin
Mouse(x, y, 0, 0, False)
Exit;
end;
end;

procedure MineOre;
begin
repeat
FindOre;
until ChooseOption(x, y, ‘ine’)

Wait(1500+random(500));
end;

procedure Droppa;
begin
if(InvFull)then
begin
Beer := BitmapFromString(5, 5,
‘000001C9C1C9CDC5CDD0CAD0CDC5CD000001D7D1D7D9D2D8DAD5D9’ +
‘DDD9DD564D42000001E6E2E6E7E4E7E8E5E8564D42000001C09018’ +
‘F4F2F4F2F0F2544A3B000001C09018C09018C09018’);
if(FindItemBmpTol(Beer,50))then
begin
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Eat’,1);
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Drink’,1);
end;
if(DropRocks = True)then
begin
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Use’,1);
end else
ClickAllItemsBmpTolWait(‘Drop’,Ore,50,1);
FreeBitmap(Beer);
end;
end;

Procedure CheeseBan;
begin
if (useantiban = True) then begin
PickUpMouseEvery(5+random(10));
LeaveScreenEvery(15+random(5));
HoverEvery(25+random(20),‘random’);
end;
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
Cleardebug;
cst := getsystemTime;
srt := (cst - sst) / 1000;
tih := srt / 3600;
tim := (srt / 60) - tih * 60;
tis := srt - tim * 60 - tih * 3600;
awt := wet - wst
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’ BigFish PowerMiner ‘);
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’ Worked For ’ + inttostr(tih) + ’ Hours ’ + inttostr(tim) + ’ Minutes ’ + inttostr(tis) + ’ Seconds. ‘);
Writeln(’ Mined and droped ’ + IntToStr(lol) + ’ Loads. ‘)
Writeln(’ We have gained ’ + IntToStr(lol1) + ’ levels ‘)
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
SRLRandomsReport;
End;

Procedure FindLost;
begin
If(not(FindObj(x,y,‘ine’,6513514,5)))then
begin
Writeln(’ I Think We Are Lost :/’)
Writeln(’ Logging Out to be safe :D’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
End;

Procedure GetColors;
var lol,x, y :integer;
begin
Writeln(’ Finding Colors…’)
FindOreColors(6513514,5,5)
end;

begin
//Tih := 0;
sst := GetSystemTime;
lol:=0;
lol1:=0;
setupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
NumberOfPlayers(1);
CurrentPlayer:= FirstPlayer;
DeclarePlayers;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
ActivateClient;
FindRs;
CheckIn;
makecompass(‘N’)
SetChat(chat1,1);
SetChat(chat2,2);
SetChat(chat3,3);
FixChat;
Highestangle;
wait(100+random(100))
Getcolors;
SetChat(‘off’,1);
repeat
repeat
MineOre;
Wait(200+random(250));
until(invfull)
FindRandoms;
Droppa;
CheeseBan;
FindLost;
SetChat(‘off’,1);
lol := lol + 1;
Wait(100+random(50));
DisguiseScar('Mined ’ + IntToStr(lol) + ’ Loads. ');
Progressreport;
until(lol = Loads)
Logout;
writeln(‘Done all jobs, logging out and terminating script’)
terminatescript;
end.

theres the script

item.title: My PowerMiner, with LOADDDSS of help with Home :D
item.dc:creator: @bigfish58 bigfish58
item.description:
@bigfish58 wrote:

Ok, this is like my first script, and I think i did pretty good I did a basic powerminer at first, then I spoke to home, and he changed it all to SRL 3.1, it works pretty flawlessly atm, tell me what you guys think.

[scar]program PowerMinerByBigfish!;

////////
// // ////// // // ////// // //////
// // // // // // // // // //// //
//////// // // // // // // ////////// //
// // // // // // // // //
// // // //// //// // //
// ////// // // //////// //

                //

//// //// //
//// //// // // ////// ////// // ////// //
//// // // // //// // // // //// // //
// //// // // // // ////////// // //
// //// // // // // // // //
// // // // // // // //
// // // // // //////// // //

{.include SRL\SRL.scar}
{.Include SRL\SRL\Extended\xMapWalk.Scar}
{.include SRL\SRL\skill\Mining.scar}

{/////////////////// SETUP //////////////////////////////////////////////////}
const
Chat1 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want public chat on? change to on if you do
Chat2 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want private chat on? change to on if you do
Chat3 = ‘off’ ; //Do you want trade/compete on? change to on if you do
RockColour = 2174282 ; //Colour of rock
Loads = 100 ; // How many loads to do before logout
DropRocks = True ; // Drop All Rocks Expect Picks? ~Reccomended as True!
UseAntiBan = True ; // Use Antiban?
RunDir = ‘N’ ; // Where to run if fight and so on
Username = ‘bigfish58’ ; //Your RS Username
PassWord = ‘’ ; //Your RS password
NickName = ‘igf’ ; //Your RS Nickname, first 3 letters after the first letter
{//////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////}

FirstPlayer = 0;
procedure DeclarePlayers;
begin
HowManyPlayers := 1;
NumberOfPlayers( HowManyPlayers );
CurrentPlayer := 0;

Players[0].Name := Username;
Players[0].Pass := PassWord;
Players[0].Nick := NickName;
Players[0].Active:=True;

end;

var
i : integer;
wet, cst, tis, wst, tim, awt, tih, srt, sst,beer,lol1,lol:integer;

Procedure CheckIn;
Begin
if ( not ( GetColor ( 738, 187 ) = 1881790 ))
Then Begin
LoginPlayer;
End;
End;

procedure FindRandoms;
begin
FindNormalRandoms;
if(FindFight)then
begin
RunAwayDirection(RunDir);
Wait(8000+random(2000));
RunBack;
If(wearedead) Then begin
Writeln(‘Ahhh shitt, you died!’)
Writenln(‘Logging out…’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
end;
if(GasFound(x,y))then
begin
RunAwayDirection(RunDir);
Wait(2000+random(1000));
RunBack;
WriteLn(‘Waiting For Gas …’);
Wait(10000+random(2000));
end;
end;

function CheckLeveled: Boolean;
var
x, y: Integer;
begin
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Result := True;
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
Wait(500);
if(FindColor(x,y,16711680,114,358,494,454))or
(FindColor(x,y,16777215,114,358,494,454))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,0,0,True);
Wait(300);
end;
end;
end;

procedure Mine1;
begin
SetRandomOreColor;
FindRandoms;
If( Checkleveled ) Then lol1 := lol1 + 1;
if(FindObj(x,y,‘ine’,RockColour,5))then
begin
if(not(FindGas(x,y)))then
begin
Mouse(x,y,2,2,true);
if(FlagPresent)then
begin
Flag;
Wait(500+random(500));
end;
end;
end;
end;

procedure Droppa;
begin
if(InvFull)then
begin
Beer := BitmapFromString(5, 5,
‘000001C9C1C9CDC5CDD0CAD0CDC5CD000001D7D1D7D9D2D8DAD5D9’ +
‘DDD9DD564D42000001E6E2E6E7E4E7E8E5E8564D42000001C09018’ +
‘F4F2F4F2F0F2544A3B000001C09018C09018C09018’);
if(FindItemBmpTol(Beer,50))then
begin
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Eat’,1);
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Drink’,1);
end;
if(DropRocks = True)then
begin
ClickAllItemsNameWait(‘Drop’,‘Use’,1);
end else
ClickAllItemsBmpTolWait(‘Drop’,Ore,50,1);
FreeBitmap(Beer);
end;
end;

Procedure CheeseBan;
begin
if (useantiban = True) then begin
PickUpMouseEvery(5+random(10));
LeaveScreenEvery(15+random(5));
HoverEvery(25+random(20),‘random’);
end;
end;

procedure ProgressReport;
begin
Cleardebug;
cst := getsystemTime;
srt := (cst - sst) / 1000;
tih := srt / 3600;
tim := (srt / 60) - tih * 60;
tis := srt - tim * 60 - tih * 3600;
awt := wet - wst
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’ BigFish PowerMiner ‘);
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’ Worked For ’ + inttostr(tih) + ’ Hours ’ + inttostr(tim) + ’ Minutes ’ + inttostr(tis) + ’ Seconds. ‘);
Writeln(’ Mined and droped ’ + IntToStr(lol) + ’ Loads. ‘)
Writeln(’ We have gained ’ + IntToStr(lol1) + ’ levels ‘)
Writeln(’+++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++++ ‘);
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
Writeln(’’)
SRLRandomsReport;
End;

Procedure FindLost;
begin
If(not(FindObj(x,y,‘ine’,RockColour,5)))
Then begin
Writeln(’ I Think We Are Lost :/’)
Writeln(’ Logging Out to be safe :D’)
Logout;
Terminatescript;
End;
End;

Procedure GetColors;
var lol,x, y :integer;
begin
Writeln(’ Finding Colors…’)
FindOreColors(RockColour,5,5)
end;

begin
//Tih := 0;
sst := GetSystemTime;
lol:=0;
lol1:=0;
setupSRL;
SetupSRLMining;
NumberOfPlayers(1);
CurrentPlayer:= FirstPlayer;
DeclarePlayers;
NickNameBMP := CreateBitmapMaskFromText(Players[CurrentPlayer].Nick, UpChars);
ActivateClient;
FindRs;
CheckIn;
makecompass(‘N’)
SetChat(chat1,1);
SetChat(chat2,2);
SetChat(chat3,3);
FixChat;
Highestangle;
wait(100+random(100))
Getcolors;
SetChat(‘off’,1);
repeat
repeat
Mine1;
Wait(200+random(250));
until(invfull)
FindRandoms;
Droppa;
CheeseBan;
FindLost;
SetChat(‘off’,1);
lol := lol + 1;
Wait(100+random(50));
DisguiseScar(’ Mined ’ + IntToStr(lol) + ’ Loads. ');
Progressreport;
until(lol = Loads)
Logout;
writeln(‘Done all jobs, logging out and terminating script’)
terminatescript;
end.[/scar]

Read full topic
